analysis.description:
DOGEToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/40/0xe12295065f44f0cd740612b4a95e1b9c1351fd7a.sol#106-107) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/40/0xe12295065f44f0cd740612b4a95e1b9c1351fd7a.sol#215-227)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/40/0xe12295065f44f0cd740612b4a95e1b9c1351fd7a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/40/0xe12295065f44f0cd740612b4a95e1b9c1351fd7a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/40/0xe12295065f44f0cd740612b4a95e1b9c1351fd7a.sol#84) is not in mixedCase
